amendment.description: An amendment numbered 158 printed in House Report 115-297 to increase Aging and Disability Services by $51,000,000 and reduces General Departmental Management by $64,000,000 to provide additional funding for Older Americans Act Title III, parts B, C, and E nutrition programs.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A139) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A139) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A139) offered by Ms. Bonamici.
